short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates no-login-required link to currently viewed Amazon product and sends it to the clipboard. It keeps history of the links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you share an Amazon product link copied from the address bar, you inadvertently share additional personal information from your account. 

The Amazon Product Linker is designed to generate an anonymous link to the currently viewed Amazon product page and then copy it to the clipboard for easy and secure sharing on social media. Additionally, it maintains a history of these links in the browser's cache for convenient access, and this feature can be managed in the add-on options.
